ygData.subject: Re: lvl 12 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Shock of lightning.   77 dmg per hit.  (+1dmg per level above 12) OR.. you can get some decent money by getting Bind, then charging...    but I d choose Shock
ygData.messageBody:
Shock of lightning. 77 dmg per hit. (+1dmg per level above 12)

OR.. you can get some decent money by getting Bind, then charging... but I'd choose Shock of Lightning.

Drev
